ing: 1 teaspoon ground red chile pepper, or to taste
des: "This awesome homemade curry recipe blend is so delicious, you will never buy a store-bought blend again! Loaded with turmeric, garlic, ginger, mustard seed, cayenne, ginger, cloves, coriander, cardamom, cumin, and real ground chili peppers make this curry a blend to behold! Add more spices, such as fennel, fenugreek, sage, thyme, or others to bring out your own personal curry flavor! Enjoy!"
ins: Whisk coriander, cumin, turmeric, cardamom, mustard seed, ginger, garlic powder, cayenne pepper, chili powder, and ground cloves together in a bowl. Store in a glass air-tight jar or container.
